channel.description:
Hey everyone!!! :) I'm using DeltaScape[317] and have some questions for those who can help me. I really need help.
1. I need a tutorial for how to make NPCs talk ( tell how many players online or "Welcome to home area" ). 2. Where is login interfaces of my client? I can't find it anywhere... 3. Where can I get new sprites and interfaces for 317?
Don't forget!!! I'm using DeltaScape[317]!!!
Maybe there will be more questions, so I'll edit this post when I'll need your help again ;)

-Nameme123[/quote] Good for ya ;). Im helping this dude, Im editing his NPChandler class

item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“Nameme123, post:3, topic:352279”]To get the NPCs to talk then just go into NPC handler.java
and choose your Npc that you want to talk and edit what the text is!

Save and compile.

To get ammount of players just do the same as above but use
the getplayer.count string.

To get the login thing.
Goto JFrame.java and search for it.
Then change it!

Save and compile.

To get new sprites.
Create a sprites (Little image.)
Save it into your Sprites folder and save as a .PNG image.
Enter class30_2_1_1
Located your sprite using the proper string

Save and Compile.

-Nameme123[/quote]
For the login interface it depends which cache do you use, and which interface you think on. about the fullscreen out, or about the frame 176

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Nameme123 Nameme123
item.description:
@Nameme123 wrote:

To get the NPCs to talk then just go into NPC handler.java
and choose your Npc that you want to talk and edit what the text is!

Save and compile.

To get ammount of players just do the same as above but use
the getplayer.count string.

To get the login thing.
Goto JFrame.java and search for it.
Then change it!

Save and compile.

To get new sprites.
Create a sprites (Little image.)
Save it into your Sprites folder and save as a .PNG image.
Enter class30_2_1_1
Located your sprite using the proper string

Save and Compile.

-Nameme123

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

Ok so Ill help you. [NPC talking] Go into the NPChandler class(NPChandler.java) and look for this <blockquote>if (npcs[i].npcType ==</blockquote> When you find something which looks like this, underneath the last <blockquote>} }</blockquote> add this : <blockquote>if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) { //Npc Id here if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "DUDE WHAT DO YOU WANT ME TO SAY?HUH.";//What you wish your NPC to say } }</blockquote> Hope this helped! Lets go next.

  1. Its client sided. 15244(i think) is the login interface of the client. But if you want it to work, you must enable full screen interfaces, which I didnt yet. So can`t help here soz.

  2. By searching on Google, or visiting this link
    ]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=435602.0]
    Hope this helped mate!

Read full topic
